Index entries for Colombian or self numbers and related sequences
formula: a(n) = n * 2 - 1 for the first 5 numbers; a(n) = n * 2 for the second 5 numbers (recurrence)
author: _Odimar Fabeny_, Apr 19 2000
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Apr 19 2000
